org.apache.giraph.worker

类 WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.worker.WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AggregatorUsage, WorkerAggregatorUsage, WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
    封闭类:
    WorkerAggregatorHandler

    public class WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage
extends Object
implements WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage
    Not thread-safe implementation of WorkerThreadAggregatorUsage. We can use one instance of this object per thread to prevent synchronizing on each aggregate() call. In the end of superstep, values from each of these will be aggregated back to WorkerAggregatorHandler

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      WorkerAggregatorHandler.ThreadLocalWorkerAggregatorUsage()
      Constructor Creates new instances of all aggregators from WorkerAggregatorHandler
